Honda Young Engineer and Scientist's Award
honors_and_awards.description: One of the 14 recipients of Honda Young Engineer and Scientist's Award across 6 IITs for excelling in the area of science and technology. The Honda Foundation executes various programs for young talented students in Asian countries to aim at the development of human resources to inherit and promote the dissemination of ecotechnology. The Honda Y-E-S award is awarded to 14 bright students from six IITs selected through the processes of application screening, essay writing and two rounds‚Ä¶ Show more
